comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: Per Wikipedia, HMS Vivid was the base ship at Devonport, Plymouth from 1912-20, so this sailor was serving at the barracks there.

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: I wonder is this could be Michael or Loughlin Cullen, sons of Kate Cullen of Ballyduff per the 1911 census.They would have been 16 to 18.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/gnmcauley] Niall, sorry for leading you slightly astray. The Ballyduff in question was near Kilmeaden in Co. Waterford not Wicklow...
